China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 2 日星期五 10:04:35 GMT 120
Decline in German engineering orders eases in December - VDMAThe downward trend in German engineering companies' orders eased in December, as foreign customers helped offset weak domestic results amid ongoing uncertainty in Europe's largest economy, the VDMA association said on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 09:06:45 GMT LWXAXVAVG5MVNCEIOQO4D5Q2NM https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/decline-german-engineering-orders-eases-december-vdma-2024-02-02/Reuters市场欧洲市场
Armenia can no longer rely on Russia for military and defence needs - PM PashinyanArmenia can no longer rely on Russia as its main defence and military partner because Moscow has repeatedly let it down so Yerevan must think about forging closer ties with the United States and France, Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan said. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 07:18:27 GMT ZFTKQDMKEJIS5JG6HITAFKC36U https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/armenia-can-no-longer-rely-on- Russian-military-defence-needs-pm-pashinyan-says-2024-02-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
New China property financing measures set to be tested by banks' cautious approachChina aims to ramp up financing for home projects in the coming days as part of its support measures, but banks' reluctance to lend to the crisis-hit sector will remain a major obstacle for the distressed developers who need fresh funding the most. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 07:00:58 GMT 4LO3IJ7AJVNT7个月QHA23YSM https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/new-china-property-financing-measures-set-to-be-tested-by-banks-cautious-approach-2024-02-02/Clare Jim, Ziyi Tang市场亚洲市场
Tencent axes Square Enix 'Nier' mobile game as it hunts for a new hit -sourcesTencent halted the development of a highly anticipated mobile game based on Square Enix's "Nier" franchise in December, according to three people with knowledge of the matter, marking a setback in the Chinese gaming giant's hunt for new hits. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 05:30:12 GMT FUDNFB2F3RP7FCGMSEHWW2RC4I https://www.reuters.com/technology/tencent-axes-square-enix-nier-mobile-game-it-hunts-new-hit-sources-2024-02-02/Josh Ye技术
Japan economy likely returned to growth in Q4, but remains fragile: Reuters pollJapan's economy likely swung back to growth in the October-December period, helped by a slight pickup in external demand, though analysts warned private consumption remains fragile, a Reuters poll showed on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 05:16:26 GMT 43LWJ5马诺4NMUQHA6EGBXY6Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/japan-economy-likely-returned-growth-q4-remains-fragile-2024-02-02/Satoshi Sugiyama市场亚洲市场
North Korea fires cruise missiles off west coast -SeoulNorth Korea fired multiple cruise missiles off its west coast on Friday, South Korea's military said, marking the fourth time in just over a week that Pyongyang has launched such missiles off both coasts. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 04:17:12 GMT GHRD6BZVXFOO7KYMQFVVSWJXYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-fires-multiple-cruise-missiles-south-korea-2024-02-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
